name: Word fun
description:
Word fun like its name suggest is a fun word puzzle game. Younger viewers can search for Pets, Animals, Insects, Musical Instruments and Vehicles - all with a graphical image.For the more advanced the following may be of interest:

Geography Section: Search for Oceans, Rivers, Countries, Capital Cities and more.

Natural World Section: Search for an extensive range of Animal and Fish names.

Detailed Options Screen
------------------------
[ AUDIO]
Sound: On / Off
Music: On / Off / Select Track

[Game Play]
Locked Level Progression: On / Off / Reset
Automatically Reset Progress on Game Completion: On / Off
Level Introduction: On / Off
Level Introduction for Replays: On / Off
Level Time Allowance: Easiest / Easier / Normal / Harder
